Articles.Content:
Hi I'm EnderSpace ( the Ends of the Space )

I have been playing KSP for 2 months with my friend account and wow it's the best space & science game I ever play I'm until now an professional Beginner , lol .

and if your asking why I'm EnderSpace that actually another story

I wish members welcome me

Welcome to the forums, may you enjoy your stay and visit us often if you have any questions I'm sure we would all be willing to help in any way possible!

Tweety
Welcome to the forums, if not KSP. Just remember if you can get to orbit you're almost "halfway to anywhere".

Welcome to the forums, may you enjoy your stay and visit us often if you have any questions I'm sure we would all be willing to help in any way possible!

Tweety

yes I have many questions & hundreds of ideas

i will try to stay long as I can

@Tweety I will be here long as I can , I have many questions and ideas

@pecan I orbit mun and soon I will land on it ( my dream is to have incredible duna base )

Hey there, welcome to the forums.

I'm pretty sure that your name has something to do with Minecraft, but I may be mistaken. You said you have many questions, just ask them! Just make sure to post it in the right forum section. Oh, and another thing. You can edit your post, so there is no need to post a second answer. You can also multi-quote other people. I recommend reading the Forum FAQ, everything important stands there.

Good Luck with your mun landing. Don't forget to quick save before if something goes wrong. Post pictures and tell us about it!

Have fun on the forum (and, sure, also in KSP!)

Volcanix

Thanks I will make sure that I ask , suggest , and read the FAQFAQ
Welcome to the forums! Hope you have a good time posting (and reading posts for that matter!).
Ok my ship is ready so what you guys suggest Mun or Minmus to get more science , I already orbit in mun

Mun is easier to reach and return from if you're just orbiting, Minmus is easier if you're also landing. See Chapter 4 of the tutorial in my signature for placing satellites in orbit around Mun and Minmus, Chapter 5 for crewed landings on Minmus and Mun.

Have fun.
